item.title: Dobby and me
item.description: Week 16: Scaling Giants. This art was lovingly created using: digital painting on photograph. Artist’s Notes This is how I feel everytime I hug my cat. He is a giant things to my heart! Yeah sometimes I wanted to be smaller just to cuddle with him ü•∞‚ú®üíú Social Media Twitch: soleilboo Instagram: soleil.boo Other Edit this page on GitHub. Create a bug ticket for the developer.

item.title: Disappear
item.description: Week 12: Visual Words. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes English is my second language and I‚Äôm having fun with all suffix and prefix. Google said ‚Äúdis‚Äù = ‚Äúa Latin prefix meaning ‚Äúapart,‚Äù ‚Äúasunder,‚Äù ‚Äúaway,‚Äù ‚Äúutterly,‚Äù or having a privative, negative, or reversing force…. Also my art always revolving around my daily life so this work inspired by this week little getaway trip… I‚Äôm disappeared into nature now….

item.title: Be Bold and Believe
item.description: Week 9: Bold Strokes. This art was lovingly created using: photoshop. Artist’s Notes Tomorrow I will compete in my Jiu Jisu tournament so I try to keep my mind calm and did something related to my feelings. the moment I’m on the mat is the moment I feel alive. 6 mins. only 6 mins to see how far I have become compared to myself yesterday. Control my nerves and believe in my techniques, execute fast and believe I’ve got this.

item.title: Wall- E fan Art
item.description: Week 8: High Sheen. This art was lovingly created using: Photoshop. Artist’s Notes so as soon as I look at the photo the light caught my eyes immediately. I have been thinking about Wall-E a lot this week because of Do-E, and then I saw Jump in the bin submission which is “trashbin” and then my brain just blink and connect everything together….Here we go, my boy Wall-E using the photo supplied.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Week 7: Disturbed Desert. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes Everyone have their own desert to carry. And flower can grow in the desert you know üôÇ Inspiration: orange sand colour of Australian desert and Goodenia-one of Australian desert Plants Combined with my goal of digital portrait painting this year. Hope you all enjoy this work. And yes flowers can grow in the desert.
